#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		string str;
		cin>>str;
		int c=0,i;
		for(i=0;i<str.length()-1;i++)
		{
			if(str[i] == 'X' && str[i+1]=='Y' || str[i]== 'Y' && str[i+1]=='X')
			{
			}
			else
			{
				c++;
			}
		}
		cout<<c<<"\n";
	}
}
